techmeme.title: DJI unveils Neo, a $200 drone aimed at content creators and casual users with features like palm takeoff, voice control, ActiveTrack, smartphone control, more (Steve Dent/Engadget)
PayPal expands into point-of-sale payments in the US by integrating its debit card with Apple Wallet and offering 5% cash back for some products up to $1K/month (Hannah Lang/Reuters)
Applied Digital, which leases out data-center space and has started an AI cloud-computing service with Nvidia chips, raised $160M from Nvidia and others (Asa Fitch/Wall Street Journal)
Federal prosecutors charge a man for allegedly using AI to create hundreds of thousands of songs by fake bands to get $10M in royalties from streaming services (Maia Coleman/New York Times)
New Mexico's AG sues Snapchat, alleging it is a "breeding ground" for predators seeking to collect sexually explicit images of children and extort them (Cat Zakrzewski/Washington Post)
